title: Mystery Gifts Lagging
body: When I have been gifted by my friends it is often taking a few hours to come through. I suspect  this is due to server lag but can anyone confirm for me why this is happening.

replies.body: Depends on if said people are online for when it's sent, you can't get a gift if your not there.
Yeah they are online, but the gifts are taking a few hours to come through from when they sent them.
They have to be online and there to receive them, my guess is they might be online but AFK.
